# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# User-specific settings
*.user
*.suo
*.userprefs

# Unity cache / build folders
/Library/
/Temp/
/Obj/
/Build/
/Builds/
/Logs/
/UserSettings/
/MemoryCaptures/
/Assets/AssetStoreTools*

# Unity auto-generated files
ExportedObj/
.vs/
.gradle/
.idea/
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db

# Android / iOS specific
*.apk
*.aab
*.ipa
*.keystore

# Gradle cache
.gradle/

# Crash reports
sysinfo.txt

# Packed Addressables
/ServerData/
